title: Last house on the beach - Franco Prosperi 1978 / DVD9
description:
Last house on the Beach (La Settima Donna) - Franco Prosperi 1978 / Italy <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078235/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078235/</a>

In my opinion on of the best revenge/terror movies.

Sister Cristina (Florinda Bolkan) plays a nun who takes the teenage girls in her care to a remote house where they rehearse A Midsummer Night&#039;s Dream. Three thugs show up, brutally raping and terrorizing the girls, killing one by raping her with a cane, until Bolkan renounces her teachings and seeks bloody revenge

Picture: 2.35:1, 16:9 Anamprphic WS
Sound: Italian / German
Subtitles: English / German
Format: PAL

Extras:
# Featurette - Holy beauty VS Evil beasts
# Italian and German trailer
# Photo gallery


Encoded with DVD-shrink (Untouched) 
Ripped from the Sazuma DVD with gatefold cover but I scanned the front/back and made a custom one.

Also includes the soundtrack by Roberto Pregadio (@VBR)

Enjoy!
